title.text: RFC 8096: The IPv6-Specific MIB Modules Are Obsolete

contents.text:
Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF)                         B. Fenner
Request for Comments: 8096                         Arista Networks, Inc.
Obsoletes: 2452, 2454, 2465, 2466                             April 2017
Category: Informational
ISSN: 2070-1721
The IPv6-Specific MIB Modules Are Obsolete
contents.zh-CHS: 特定于IPv6的MIB模块已过时

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: In 2005-2006, the IPv6 MIB update group published updated versions of the IP-MIB, UDP-MIB, TCP-MIB, and IP-FORWARD-MIB modules, which use the InetAddressType/InetAddress construct to handle IPv4 and IPv6 in the same table. This document contains versions of the obsoleted IPV6-MIB, IPV6-TC, IPV6-ICMP-MIB, IPV6-TCP-MIB, and IPV6-UDP-MIB modules for the purpose of updating MIB module repositories. This document obsoletes RFCs 2452, 2454, 2465, and 2466 (i.e., the RFCs containing these MIBs) and reclassifies them as Historic.
contents.zh-CHS: 在2005-2006年间，IPv6 MIB更新组发布了IP-MIB、UDP-MIB、TCP-MIB和IP-FORWARD-MIB模块的更新版本，这些模块使用InetAddressType/InetAddress构造在同一个表中处理IPv4和IPv6。本文档包含已淘汰的IPV6-MIB、IPV6-TC、IPV6-ICMP-MIB、IPV6-TCP-MIB和IPV6-UDP-MIB模块的版本，用于更新MIB模块存储库。本文件淘汰了RFC 2452、2454、2465和2466（即包含这些MIB的RFC），并将其重新分类为历史记录。

contents.text: Table of Contents
contents.zh-CHS: 目录

contents.text: 1. Motivation
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 动机

contents.text: In 2005-2006, the IPv6 MIB update group published updated versions of the IP-MIB [RFC4293], UDP-MIB [RFC4113], TCP-MIB [RFC4022], and IP-FORWARD-MIB [RFC4292] modules, which use the InetAddressType/ InetAddress construct to handle IPv4 and IPv6 in the same table. The RFC Editor marked these documents as obsoleting the corresponding IPV6-MIBs, but the extracted content of these MIBs never changed in MIB repositories, and the original RFCs (as is normal IETF policy) never changed from being Proposed Standard.
contents.zh-CHS: 在2005-2006年间，IPv6 MIB更新组发布了IP-MIB[RFC4293]、UDP-MIB[RFC4113]、TCP-MIB[RFC4022]和IP-FORWARD-MIB[RFC4292]模块的更新版本，这些模块使用InetAddressType/InetAddress构造在同一个表中处理IPv4和IPv6。RFC编辑器将这些文档标记为淘汰相应的IPV6 MIB，但这些MIB的提取内容在MIB存储库中从未更改，并且原始RFC（通常为IETF策略）从未更改为建议的标准。

contents.text: Note that the timeline of these MIB modules is as shown below (and it is the added support for IPv6 in the later revision of the original modules that people often overlook).
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，这些MIB模块的时间线如下所示（人们经常忽略的是在原始模块的后续版本中添加的对IPv6的支持）。

contents.text: This causes an unclear situation when simply looking at MIB repositories, so we are simply republishing these MIB modules with the Structure of Management Information (SMI) status changed to obsolete. This is an unusual step, and it is not the intended path with every obsolete MIB module; the special history of these modules led to this special step.
contents.zh-CHS: 这导致在简单查看MIB存储库时出现不清楚的情况，因此我们只是在管理信息（SMI）状态的结构更改为过时的情况下重新发布这些MIB模块。这是一个不寻常的步骤，它不是每个过时的MIB模块的预期路径；这些模块的特殊历史导致了这一特殊步骤。

contents.text: 2. Historic IPV6-TC
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 历史IPV6-TC

contents.text: IPV6-TC DEFINITIONS ::= BEGIN

IMPORTS Integer32 FROM SNMPv2-SMI TEXTUAL-CONVENTION FROM SNMPv2-TC;
contents.zh-CHS: 从SNMPv2导入整数32，从SNMPv2 TC导入SMI文本约定；

contents.text:
-- definition of textual conventions
Ipv6Address ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION
     DISPLAY-HINT "2x:"
     STATUS       obsolete
     DESCRIPTION
       "This data type is used to model IPv6 addresses.
        This is a binary string of 16 octets in network
        byte-order.
This object is obsoleted by INET-ADDRESS-MIB::InetAddress." SYNTAX OCTET STRING (SIZE (16))
contents.zh-CHS: 此对象已被INET-ADDRESS-MIB:：InetAddress淘汰。“语法八位字节字符串（大小（16））

contents.text:
Ipv6AddressPrefix ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION
     DISPLAY-HINT "2x:"
     STATUS       obsolete
     DESCRIPTION
       "This data type is used to model IPv6 address
       prefixes.  This is a binary string of up to 16
       octets in network byte-order.
       This object is obsoleted by INET-ADDRESS-MIB::InetAddress."
     SYNTAX       OCTET STRING (SIZE (0..16))

Ipv6AddressIfIdentifier ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION
     DISPLAY-HINT "2x:"
     STATUS       obsolete
     DESCRIPTION
       "This data type is used to model IPv6 address
       interface identifiers.  This is a binary string
        of up to 8 octets in network byte-order.
This object is obsoleted by IP-MIB::Ipv6AddressIfIdentifierTC."
contents.zh-CHS: 此对象已被IP-MIB:：IPV6AddressionIdentifierTC淘汰。”

contents.text: SYNTAX OCTET STRING (SIZE (0..8))
contents.zh-CHS: 语法八位字节字符串（大小（0..8））

contents.text:
Ipv6IfIndex ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION
     DISPLAY-HINT "d"
     STATUS       obsolete
     DESCRIPTION
       "A unique value, greater than zero for each
       internetwork-layer interface in the managed
       system.  It is recommended that values are assigned
       contiguously starting from 1.  The value for each
       internetwork-layer interface must remain constant
       at least from one re-initialization of the entity's
       network management system to the next
       re-initialization.
This object is obsoleted by IF-MIB::InterfaceIndex." SYNTAX Integer32 (1..2147483647)
contents.zh-CHS: 此对象已被IF-MIB:：InterfaceIndex淘汰。“语法整数32（1..2147483647）

contents.text:
Ipv6IfIndexOrZero ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION
     DISPLAY-HINT "d"
     STATUS       obsolete
     DESCRIPTION
         "This textual convention is an extension of the
         Ipv6IfIndex convention.  The latter defines
         a greater than zero value used to identify an IPv6
         interface in the managed system.  This extension
         permits the additional value of zero.  The value
         zero is object-specific and must therefore be
         defined as part of the description of any object
         which uses this syntax.  Examples of the usage of
         zero might include situations where interface was
         unknown, or when none or all interfaces need to be
         referenced.
This object is obsoleted by IF-MIB::InterfaceIndexOrZero." SYNTAX Integer32 (0..2147483647)
contents.zh-CHS: 此对象已被IF-MIB:：InterfaceIndexOrZero淘汰。“语法整数32（0..2147483647）

contents.text: END
contents.zh-CHS: 终止

contents.text: 3. Historic IPV6-MIB
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 历史IPV6-MIB

contents.text: IPV6-MIB DEFINITIONS ::= BEGIN

IMPORTS MODULE-IDENTITY, OBJECT-TYPE, NOTIFICATION-TYPE, mib-2, Counter32, Unsigned32, Integer32, Gauge32 FROM SNMPv2-SMI DisplayString, PhysAddress, TruthValue, TimeStamp, VariablePointer, RowPointer FROM SNMPv2-TC MODULE-COMPLIANCE, OBJECT-GROUP, NOTIFICATION-GROUP FROM SNMPv2-CONF Ipv6IfIndex, Ipv6Address, Ipv6AddressPrefix, Ipv6AddressIfIdentifier, Ipv6IfIndexOrZero FROM IPV6-TC;
contents.zh-CHS: 从SNMPv2 SMI DisplayString、PhysAddress、TruthValue、TimeStamp、VariablePointer、SNMPv2 TC MODULE-COMPLIANCE的行指针、SNMPv2 CONF IPV6iIndex的对象组、通知组、SNMPv2 CONF IPV6iIndex的行指针、，IPV6地址标识符，IPV6iIndexorZero来自IPV6-TC；

ipv6Forwarding OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX INTEGER { forwarding(1), -- acting as a router

contents.text: -- NOT acting as notForwarding(2) -- a router } MAX-ACCESS read-write STATUS obsolete DESCRIPTION "The indication of whether this entity is acting as an IPv6 router in respect to the forwarding of datagrams received by, but not addressed to, this entity. contents.zh-CHS: --不作为notForwarding（2）--路由器}MAX-ACCESS读写状态过时描述“指示此实体是否作为IPv6路由器转发此实体接收但未发送到的数据报。IPv6路由器转发数据报。IPv6主机不转发数据报（通过主机路由的源除外）。

contents.text: Note that for some managed nodes, this object may take on only a subset of the values possible. Accordingly, it is appropriate for an agent to return a `wrongValue' response if a management station attempts to change this object to an inappropriate value.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，对于某些托管节点，此对象可能仅具有可能值的子集。因此，如果管理站试图将此对象更改为不适当的值，则代理返回“错误值”响应是合适的。

contents.text:
This object is obsoleted by IP-MIB::ipv6IpForwarding."
::= { ipv6MIBObjects 1 }

ipv6DefaultHopLimit OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX INTEGER(0..255) MAX-ACCESS read-write STATUS obsolete DESCRIPTION "The default value inserted into the Hop Limit field of the IPv6 header of datagrams originated at this entity, whenever a Hop Limit value is not supplied by the transport layer protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: ipv6DefaultHopLimit对象类型语法整数（0..255）MAX-ACCESS读写状态过时描述“当传输层协议未提供跃点限制值时，插入到此实体产生的数据报的IPv6报头的跃点限制字段中的默认值。

contents.text: ipv6Interfaces OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX Unsigned32 MAX-ACCESS read-only STATUS obsolete DESCRIPTION "The number of IPv6 interfaces (regardless of their current state) present on this system.
contents.zh-CHS: ipv6Interfaces对象类型语法Unsigned32 MAX-ACCESS只读状态过时描述“此系统上存在的IPv6接口数（无论其当前状态如何）。

contents.text:
This object is obsolete; there is no direct replacement,
   but its value can be derived from the number of rows
   in the IP-MIB::ipv6InterfaceTable."
::= { ipv6MIBObjects 3 }

ipv6IfTableLastChange OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX TimeStamp MAX-ACCESS read-only STATUS obsolete DESCRIPTION "The value of sysUpTime at the time of the last insertion or removal of an entry in the ipv6IfTable. If the number of entries has been unchanged since the last re-initialization of the local network management subsystem, then this object contains a zero value.
contents.zh-CHS: ipv6IfTableLastChange对象类型语法时间戳MAX-ACCESS只读状态过时说明“上次在ipv6IfTable中插入或删除条目时的sysUpTime值。如果自上次重新初始化本地网络管理子系统以来，条目数保持不变，则此对象包含零值。

ipv6IfLowerLayer OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX VariablePointer MAX-ACCESS read-only STATUS obsolete DESCRIPTION "This object identifies the protocol layer over which this network interface operates. If this network interface operates over the data-link layer, then the value of this object refers to an instance of ifIndex [RFC1573]. If this network interface operates over an IPv4 interface, the value of this object refers to an instance of ipAdEntAddr [RFC1213].
contents.zh-CHS: ipv6IfLowerLayer对象类型语法变量指针MAX-ACCESS只读状态过时描述“此对象标识此网络接口在其上运行的协议层。如果此网络接口在数据链路层上运行，则此对象的值引用iIndex[RFC1573]的实例。如果此网络接口通过IPv4接口运行，则此对象的值引用ipAdEntAddr[RFC1213]的实例。

contents.text: If this network interface operates over another IPv6 interface, the value of this object refers to an instance of ipv6IfIndex. If this network interface is not currently operating over an active protocol layer, then the value of this object should be set to the OBJECT ID { 0 0 }.

ipv6IfPhysicalAddress OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX PhysAddress MAX-ACCESS read-only STATUS obsolete DESCRIPTION "The interface's physical address. For example, for an IPv6 interface attached to an 802.x link, this object normally contains a MAC address. Note that in some cases this address may differ from the address of the interface's protocol sub-layer. The interface's media-specific MIB must define the bit and byte ordering and the format of the value of this object. For interfaces which do not have such an address (e.g., a serial line), this object should contain an octet string of zero length.
contents.zh-CHS: ipv6IfPhysicalAddress对象类型语法PhysAddress MAX-ACCESS只读状态过时说明“接口的物理地址。例如，对于连接到802.x链路的IPv6接口，此对象通常包含MAC地址。注意，在某些情况下，该地址可能与接口协议子层的地址不同。接口的媒体特定MIB必须定义该对象的位和字节顺序以及值的格式。对于没有此类地址的接口（例如，串行线），此对象应包含长度为零的八位字节字符串。

ipv6IfAdminStatus OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX  INTEGER {
             up(1),       -- ready to pass packets
             down(2)
            }
    MAX-ACCESS  read-write
    STATUS      obsolete
    DESCRIPTION
      "The desired state of the interface.  When a managed
      system initializes, all IPv6 interfaces start with
      ipv6IfAdminStatus in the down(2) state.  As a result
      of either explicit management action or per
      configuration information retained by the managed
      system, ipv6IfAdminStatus is then changed to
      the up(1) state (or remains in the down(2) state).

This object is obsolete.  IPv6 does not have a
  separate admin status; the admin status of the
  interface is represented by IF-MIB::ifAdminStatus."
::= { ipv6IfEntry 9 }

contents.zh-CHS: ipv6IfOperStatus对象类型语法整数{up（1），--准备传递数据包

contents.text:

         notPresent(5)      -- missing
        }
MAX-ACCESS  read-only
STATUS      obsolete
DESCRIPTION
  "The current operational state of the interface.
  The noIfIdentifier(3) state indicates that no valid
  Interface Identifier is assigned to the interface.
  This state usually indicates that the link-local
  interface address failed Duplicate Address Detection.
  If ipv6IfAdminStatus is down(2) then ipv6IfOperStatus
  should be down(2).  If ipv6IfAdminStatus is changed
  to up(1) then ipv6IfOperStatus should change to up(1)
  if the interface is ready to transmit and receive
  network traffic; it should remain in the down(2) or
  noIfIdentifier(3) state if and only if there is a
  fault that prevents it from going to the up(1) state;
  it should remain in the notPresent(5) state if
  the interface has missing (typically, lower layer)
  components.

This object is obsolete.  IPv6 does not have a
  separate operational status; the operational status of the
  interface is represented by IF-MIB::ifOperStatus."
::= { ipv6IfEntry 10 }

SYNTAX      INTEGER {

  that this is a valid address that can appear as
  the destination or source address of a packet.
  The deprecated(2) state indicates that this is
  a valid but deprecated address that should no longer
  be used as a source address in new communications,
  but packets addressed to such an address are
  processed as expected.  The invalid(3) state indicates
  that this is not valid address which should not
  appear as the destination or source address of
  a packet.  The inaccessible(4) state indicates that
  the address is not accessible because the interface
  to which this address is assigned is not operational.

contents.text: DESCRIPTION "The general set of conditions that would cause the selection of one multipath route (set of next hops for a given destination) is referred to as 'policy'. Unless the mechanism indicated by ipv6RouteProtocol specified otherwise, the policy specifier is the 8-bit Traffic Class field of the IPv6 packet header that is zero extended at the left to a 32-bit value.
contents.zh-CHS: DESCRIPTION“导致选择一条多路径路由的一般条件集（给定目的地的下一跳集）被称为“策略”。除非ipv6RouteProtocol指示的机制另有规定，否则策略说明符是IPv6数据包头的8位流量类字段，该字段在左侧零扩展为32位值。

contents.text: Protocols defining 'policy' otherwise must either define a set of values which are valid for this object or must implement an integer-instanced policy table for which this object's value acts as an index.
contents.zh-CHS: 否则，定义“策略”的协议必须定义一组对该对象有效的值，或者必须实现一个整型实例化策略表，该对象的值用作该表的索引。

ipv6RouteValid OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX TruthValue MAX-ACCESS read-write STATUS obsolete DESCRIPTION "Setting this object to the value 'false(2)' has the effect of invalidating the corresponding entry in the ipv6RouteTable object. That is, it effectively disassociates the destination identified with said entry from the route identified with said entry. It is an implementation-specific matter as to whether the agent removes an invalidated entry from the table. Accordingly, management stations must be prepared to receive tabular information from agents that corresponds to entries not currently in use. Proper interpretation of such entries requires examination of the relevant ipv6RouteValid object.
contents.zh-CHS: ipv6RouteValid对象类型语法TruthValue MAX-ACCESS读写状态过时描述“将此对象设置为值”false（2）'的作用是使ipv6RouteTable对象中的相应条目无效。也就是说，它有效地将用所述条目标识的目的地与用所述条目标识的路由断开关联。代理是否从表中删除无效条目是实现特定的问题。因此，管理站ons必须准备好从代理处接收与当前未使用的条目相对应的表格信息。正确解释此类条目需要检查相关ipv6RouteValid对象。

ipv6NetToMediaValid OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX TruthValue MAX-ACCESS read-write STATUS obsolete DESCRIPTION "Setting this object to the value 'false(2)' has the effect of invalidating the corresponding entry in the ipv6NetToMediaTable. That is, it effectively disassociates the interface identified with said entry from the mapping identified with said entry. It is an implementation-specific matter as to whether the agent removes an invalidated entry from the table. Accordingly, management stations must be prepared to receive tabular information from agents that corresponds to entries not currently in use. Proper interpretation of such entries requires examination of the relevant ipv6NetToMediaValid object.
contents.zh-CHS: ipv6NetToMediaValid对象类型语法TruthValue MAX-ACCESS读写状态过时说明“将此对象设置为值'false（2）'的作用是使ipv6NetToMediaTable中的相应条目无效。也就是说，它有效地将用所述条目标识的接口与用所述条目标识的映射断开关联。代理是否从表中删除无效条目是实现特定的问题。因此，管理站必须准备好从代理处接收与当前未使用的条目对应的表格信息。对此类条目的正确解释需要检查相关IPV6NetTomeDia有效对象。

contents.text: Note that a receiving interface is the interface to which a given ICMPv6 message is addressed which may not be necessarily the input interface for the message.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，接收接口是给定ICMPv6消息的寻址接口，不一定是消息的输入接口。

contents.text: Similarly, the sending interface is the interface that sources a given ICMP message which is usually but not necessarily the output interface for the message.
contents.zh-CHS: 类似地，发送接口是发送给定ICMP消息的接口，通常但不一定是消息的输出接口。

contents.text: udp      OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= { mib-2 7 }
-- the UDP over IPv6 Listener table
contents.zh-CHS: --IPv6上的UDP侦听器表

contents.text:
-- This table contains information about this entity's
-- UDP/IPv6 endpoints.  Only endpoints utilizing IPv6 addresses
-- are contained in this table.  This entity's UDP/IPv4 endpoints
-- are contained in udpTable.
ipv6UdpTable OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX SEQUENCE OF Ipv6UdpEntry MAX-ACCESS not-accessible STATUS obsolete DESCRIPTION "A table containing UDP listener information for UDP/IPv6 endpoints.
contents.zh-CHS: ipv6UdpTable Ipv6UdpEntry MAX-ACCESS的对象类型语法序列不可访问状态已过时描述“包含UDP/IPv6端点的UDP侦听器信息的表。

contents.text:
This table is obsoleted by UDP-MIB::udpEndpointTable."
::= { udp 6 }
ipv6UdpEntry OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX Ipv6UdpEntry MAX-ACCESS not-accessible STATUS obsolete DESCRIPTION "Information about a particular current UDP listener.
contents.zh-CHS: ipv6UdpEntry对象类型语法ipv6UdpEntry MAX-ACCESS不可访问状态过时描述“有关特定当前UDP侦听器的信息。

contents.text: Note that conceptual rows in this table require an additional index object compared to udpTable, since IPv6 addresses are not guaranteed to be unique on the managed node.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，与udpTable相比，此表中的概念行需要一个额外的索引对象，因为IPv6地址在托管节点上不保证唯一。

contents.text: Ipv6UdpEntry ::= SEQUENCE {
ipv6UdpLocalAddress Ipv6Address, ipv6UdpLocalPort INTEGER, ipv6UdpIfIndex Ipv6IfIndexOrZero }
contents.zh-CHS: ipv6UdpLocalAddress Ipv6Address，ipv6UdpLocalPort INTEGER，ipv6UdpIfIndex Ipv6IfIndexOrZero}

contents.text: ipv6UdpLocalAddress OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX Ipv6Address MAX-ACCESS not-accessible STATUS obsolete DESCRIPTION "The local IPv6 address for this UDP listener. In the case of a UDP listener which is willing to accept datagrams for any IPv6 address associated with the managed node, the value ::0 is used.
contents.zh-CHS: ipv6UdpLocalAddress对象类型语法Ipv6Address MAX-ACCESS不可访问状态过时描述“此UDP侦听器的本地IPv6地址。如果UDP侦听器愿意接受与托管节点关联的任何IPv6地址的数据报，则使用值：：0。

contents.text:
This object is obsoleted by UDP-MIB::udpEndpointLocalAddress."
::= { ipv6UdpEntry 1 }
ipv6UdpLocalPort OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX INTEGER (0..65535) MAX-ACCESS not-accessible STATUS obsolete DESCRIPTION "The local port number for this UDP listener.
contents.zh-CHS: ipv6UdpLocalPort对象类型语法整数（0..65535）MAX-ACCESS不可访问状态过时描述“此UDP侦听器的本地端口号。

contents.text:
This object is obsoleted by UDP-MIB::udpEndpointLocalPort."
::= { ipv6UdpEntry 2 }

ipv6UdpIfIndex OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX Ipv6IfIndexOrZero MAX-ACCESS read-only STATUS obsolete DESCRIPTION "An index object used to disambiguate conceptual rows in the table, since the ipv6UdpLocalAddress/ipv6UdpLocalPort pair may not be unique.
contents.zh-CHS: ipv6UdpIfIndex对象类型语法Ipv6IfIndexOrZero MAX-ACCESS只读状态过时描述“用于消除表中概念行歧义的索引对象，因为ipv6UdpLocalAddress/ipv6UdpLocalPort对可能不唯一。

contents.text: This object identifies the local interface that is associated with ipv6UdpLocalAddress for this UDP listener. If such a local interface cannot be determined, this object should take on the value 0. (A possible example of this would be if the value of ipv6UdpLocalAddress is ::0.)
contents.zh-CHS: 此对象标识与此UDP侦听器的ipv6UdpLocalAddress关联的本地接口。如果无法确定此类本地接口，则此对象的值应为0。（如果ipv6UdpLocalAddress的值为：：0，则可能是一个示例。）

contents.text: The interface identified by a particular non-0 value of this index is the same interface as identified by the same value of ipv6IfIndex.
contents.zh-CHS: 此索引的特定非0值标识的接口与IPV6iIndex的相同值标识的接口相同。

contents.text: The value of this object must remain constant during
contents.zh-CHS: 此对象的值在运行期间必须保持不变

contents.text: the life of this UDP endpoint.
contents.zh-CHS: 这个UDP端点的生命。

contents.text:
This object is obsoleted by the zone identifier in
      an InetAddressIPv6z address in
      UDP-MIB::udpEndpointLocalAddress."

contents.text: tcp      OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= { mib-2 6 }
-- the TCP over IPv6 Connection table
contents.zh-CHS: --TCP over IPv6连接表

contents.text:
-- This connection table contains information about this
-- entity's existing TCP connections between IPv6 endpoints.
-- Only connections between IPv6 addresses are contained in
-- this table.  This entity's connections between IPv4
-- endpoints are contained in tcpConnTable.

ipv6TcpConnTable OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX SEQUENCE OF Ipv6TcpConnEntry MAX-ACCESS not-accessible STATUS obsolete DESCRIPTION "A table containing TCP connection-specific information, for only those connections whose endpoints are IPv6 addresses.
contents.zh-CHS: IPV6TCPCONNTERY的IPV6TCPCONNTERY对象类型语法序列MAX-ACCESS不可访问状态过时描述“包含TCP连接特定信息的表，仅适用于端点为IPv6地址的连接。

contents.text:
This table is obsoleted by TCP-MIB::tcpConnectionTable."
::= { tcp 16 }

ipv6TcpConnEntry OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX Ipv6TcpConnEntry MAX-ACCESS not-accessible STATUS obsolete DESCRIPTION "A conceptual row of the ipv6TcpConnTable containing information about a particular current TCP connection. Each row of this table is transient, in that it ceases to exist when (or soon after) the connection makes the transition to the CLOSED state.
contents.zh-CHS: IPV6TCPConEntry对象类型语法IPV6TCPConEntry MAX-ACCESS不可访问状态过时描述“IPV6TCPConTable的概念行，包含有关特定当前TCP连接的信息。此表的每一行都是暂时的，因为它在以下时间（或之后不久）停止存在连接将转换为关闭状态。

contents.text: Note that conceptual rows in this table require an additional index object compared to tcpConnTable, since IPv6 addresses are not guaranteed to be unique on the managed node.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，与TCPConTable相比，此表中的概念行需要额外的索引对象，因为IPv6地址在托管节点上不保证唯一。

contents.text:
This entry is obsoleted by TCP-MIB::tcpConnectionEntry."
INDEX   { ipv6TcpConnLocalAddress,
          ipv6TcpConnLocalPort,
          ipv6TcpConnRemAddress,
          ipv6TcpConnRemPort,
          ipv6TcpConnIfIndex }
::= { ipv6TcpConnTable 1 }

Ipv6TcpConnEntry ::=
   SEQUENCE { ipv6TcpConnLocalAddress    Ipv6Address,
              ipv6TcpConnLocalPort       INTEGER,
              ipv6TcpConnRemAddress      Ipv6Address,
              ipv6TcpConnRemPort         INTEGER,

ipv6TcpConnState INTEGER }

In the case of a connection in the listen state which is willing to accept connections for any IPv6 address associated with the managed node, the value ::0 is used.
contents.zh-CHS: IPV6TCPConLocalAddress对象类型语法Ipv6Address MAX-ACCESS不可访问状态过时描述“此TCP连接的本地IPv6地址。如果连接处于侦听状态，并且愿意接受与托管节点关联的任何IPv6地址的连接，则使用值：：0。

contents.text: ipv6TcpConnLocalPort OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX INTEGER (0..65535) MAX-ACCESS not-accessible STATUS obsolete DESCRIPTION "The local port number for this TCP connection.
contents.zh-CHS: IPV6TCPConLocalPort对象类型语法整数（0..65535）MAX-ACCESS不可访问状态过时描述“此TCP连接的本地端口号。

contents.text:
This object is obsoleted by TCP-MIB::tcpConnectionLocalPort."
::= { ipv6TcpConnEntry 2 }
ipv6TcpConnRemAddress OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX Ipv6Address MAX-ACCESS not-accessible STATUS obsolete DESCRIPTION "The remote IPv6 address for this TCP connection.
contents.zh-CHS: IPV6TCPConnerAddress对象类型语法Ipv6Address MAX-ACCESS不可访问状态过时描述“此TCP连接的远程IPv6地址。

contents.text:
This object is obsoleted by TCP-MIB::tcpConnectionRemAddress."
::= { ipv6TcpConnEntry 3 }
ipv6TcpConnRemPort OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX INTEGER (0..65535) MAX-ACCESS not-accessible STATUS obsolete DESCRIPTION "The remote port number for this TCP connection.
contents.zh-CHS: IPV6TCPCONREMPORT对象类型语法整数（0..65535）MAX-ACCESS不可访问状态过时说明“此TCP连接的远程端口号。

contents.text:
This object is obsoleted by TCP-MIB::tcpConnectionRemPort."
::= { ipv6TcpConnEntry 4 }
ipv6TcpConnIfIndex OBJECT-TYPE
contents.zh-CHS: IPV6TCPConniIndex对象类型

contents.text: SYNTAX Ipv6IfIndexOrZero MAX-ACCESS not-accessible STATUS obsolete DESCRIPTION "An index object used to disambiguate conceptual rows in the table, since the connection 4-tuple may not be unique.
contents.zh-CHS: 语法Ipv6IfIndexOrZero MAX-ACCESS not ACCESS STATUS OPERTED DESCRIPTION“用于消除表中概念行歧义的索引对象，因为连接4元组可能不唯一。

contents.text: If the connection's remote address (ipv6TcpConnRemAddress) is a link-local address and the connection's local address (ipv6TcpConnLocalAddress) is not a link-local address, this object identifies a local interface on the same link as the connection's remote link-local address.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果连接的远程地址（IPV6TCPConnerAddress）是链接本地地址，而连接的本地地址（IPV6TCPConnerLocalAddress）不是链接本地地址，则此对象会将同一链接上的本地接口标识为连接的远程链接本地地址。

contents.text: Otherwise, this object identifies the local interface that is associated with the ipv6TcpConnLocalAddress for this TCP connection. If such a local interface cannot be determined, this object should take on the value 0. (A possible example of this would be if the value of ipv6TcpConnLocalAddress is ::0.)
contents.zh-CHS: 否则，此对象将标识与此TCP连接的IPV6TCPConLocalAddress关联的本地接口。如果无法确定此类本地接口，则此对象的值应为0。（如果ipv6TcpConnLocalAddress的值为：：0，则可能是一个示例。）

contents.text: The interface identified by a particular non-0 value of this index is the same interface as identified by the same value of ipv6IfIndex.
contents.zh-CHS: 此索引的特定非0值标识的接口与IPV6iIndex的相同值标识的接口相同。

contents.text: The value of this object must remain constant during the life of the TCP connection.
contents.zh-CHS: 在TCP连接的生命周期内，此对象的值必须保持不变。

contents.text:
This object is obsoleted by the zone identifier in
      an InetAddressIPv6z address in either
      TCP-MIB::tcpConnectionLocalAddress or
      TCP-MIB::tcpConnectionRemAddress."
::= { ipv6TcpConnEntry 5 }

ipv6TcpConnState OBJECT-TYPE
   SYNTAX     INTEGER {
        closed(1),
        listen(2),
        synSent(3),
        synReceived(4),
        established(5),
        finWait1(6),
        finWait2(7),
        closeWait(8),
        lastAck(9),
        closing(10),
        timeWait(11),
        deleteTCB(12) }
   MAX-ACCESS read-write
STATUS obsolete DESCRIPTION "The state of this TCP connection.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态过时描述“此TCP连接的状态。

contents.text: The only value which may be set by a management station is deleteTCB(12). Accordingly, it is appropriate for an agent to return an error response ('badValue' for SNMPv1, 'wrongValue' for SNMPv2) if a management station attempts to set this object to any other value.
contents.zh-CHS: 管理站可以设置的唯一值是deleteTCB（12）。因此，如果管理站试图将此对象设置为任何其他值，则代理返回错误响应（“badValue”用于SNMPv1，“ErrorValue”用于SNMPv2）是合适的。

contents.text: If a management station sets this object to the value deleteTCB(12), then this has the effect of deleting the TCB (as defined in RFC 793) of the corresponding connection on the managed node, resulting in immediate termination of the connection.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果管理站将此对象设置为值deleteTCB（12），则这会删除受管节点上相应连接的TCB（如RFC 793中所定义），从而导致连接立即终止。

contents.text: As an implementation-specific option, a RST segment may be sent from the managed node to the other TCP endpoint (note however that RST segments are not sent reliably).
contents.zh-CHS: 作为特定于实现的选项，可以将RST段从受管节点发送到其他TCP端点（但是请注意，RST段的发送不可靠）。

contents.text:
This object is obsoleted by TCP-MIB::tcpConnectionState."
::= { ipv6TcpConnEntry 6 }

This group is obsoleted by several groups in TCP-MIB."

contents.text: 7. Reclassification
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 重新分类

contents.text: This document reclassifies [RFC2452], [RFC2454], [RFC2465], and [RFC2466] to Historic.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件将[RFC2452]、[RFC2454]、[RFC2465]和[RFC2466]重新分类为历史。

contents.text: 8. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 安全考虑

contents.text: This document contains only obsolete objects, which [RFC2578] says "should not be implemented and/or can be removed if previously implemented". Since the contents of this document should not be implemented, it has no security implications. If there were any security implications based on these objects in an implementation, removing these objects as [RFC2578] suggests would improve the security of that implementation.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档仅包含过时的对象，[RFC2578]表示“不应实现和/或如果以前实现过，则可以删除”。由于本文件的内容不应实施，因此不涉及安全问题。如果在一个实现中存在基于这些对象的任何安全隐患，那么按照[RFC2578]的建议删除这些对象将提高该实现的安全性。

contents.zh-CHS: 9. IANA考虑

contents.text: IANA has updated the SMI Numbers registry at <http://www.iana.org/assignments/smi-numbers/> as described below.

contents.text: IANA has updated the "SMI Network Management MGMT Codes Internet-standard MIB" section as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: IANA已将“SMI网络管理代码互联网标准MIB”部分更新如下：

contents.text: o Removed RFC 1213 as a reference for mib-2.5 ("icmp").
contents.zh-CHS: o 删除RFC 1213作为mib-2.5（“icmp”）的参考。

contents.text: o Updated the reference for mib-2.6 ("tcp") to point to RFC 4022.
contents.zh-CHS: o 将mib-2.6（“tcp”）的参考更新为指向RFC 4022。

contents.text: o Removed RFC 1213 as a reference for mib-2.7 ("udp").
contents.zh-CHS: o 删除RFC 1213作为mib-2.7（“udp”）的参考。

contents.text: o Removed RFC 2012 as a reference for mib-2.49 ("tcpMIB").
contents.zh-CHS: o 删除RFC 2012作为mib-2.49（“tcpMIB”）的参考。

contents.text: o Added the "(Historic)" annotation for the entries for mib-2.55 ("ipv6MIB") and mib-2.56 ("ipv6IcmpMIB") and updated the reference of each to point to this document.
contents.zh-CHS: o 为mib-2.55（“ipv6MIB”）和mib-2.56（“ipv6IcmpMIB”）的条目添加了“（历史）”注释，并更新了每个条目的引用，以指向本文档。

contents.text: IANA has updated the "SMI Experimental Codes" section as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: IANA已将“SMI实验代码”部分更新如下：

contents.zh-CHS: o 为experimental.74（“IPv6 MIB”）添加了“（历史）”注释。

contents.text: o Changed the "(Historical)" annotation for experimental.87 ("ipv6UdpMIB") to "(Historic)".
contents.zh-CHS: o 将experimental.87（“ipv6UdpMIB”）的“（历史）”注释更改为“（历史）”。

contents.zh-CHS: o 更新了experimental.86（“IPV6TCMPIB”）和experimental.87（“ipv6UdpMIB”）的参考文件，以指向本文件。
